title: Power Plays: Stories of Sin City
description: As a bodyguard of the rich and famous in Las Vegas, Ethan has got his work cut out for him. But his greatest challenge lies in his relationship with his boss, the intimidating dominant, Maxmillian Poole. Six short stories and novelettes explore the highly sexed, highly emotional bond between two men who must balance dangerous careers with an undercover romance in the most exciting city on Earth. Contains scenes of domination and submission.
author: Tricia Owens
